CustomField.description: Use this field to specify the condition to display the records where logged-in user's team is associated with the record. E.g.: If there is a Contact’s SDG and the logged-in user wants to view the contacts where all his/her team members are the owners then write query as “(Owner.Id IN (SELECT Id FROM User WHERE Team__c = '<<Team__c>>'))”. This will be further used by Universal Filter to display the desired filtered result.
CustomField.label: My Teams Records
